com.mlt.desktop.control

Class FormRecordPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mlt.desktop.control.FormRecordPane

  • public class FormRecordPane
extends java.lang.Object
    A panel that holds a grid form of fields from a record. Fields are laid out in tabs by field group if there are field groups, and optionally in sub panels defined by (grid_x, grid_y) values.

    Usage:

    • Instantiate the panel.
    • Set the edit mode.
    • Set the master record.
    • Add fields optionally indicating the grid coordinates of the sub-panel.
    • Layout the form.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

      • addField

        public void addField(java.lang.String alias)
        Add a field to the default (0, 0) sub-panel.
        Parameters:
        alias - The field alias.

      • addField

        public void addField(java.lang.String alias,
                     int row,
                     int column)
        Add a field setting its grid coordinates. Grid coordinates are relative to the field group of the field, that is, the tab where the field group will be assigned. Grid coordinates are recommended to be set sequentially.
        Parameters:
        alias - The field alias.
        row - The row index.
        column - The column index.

      • clearFields

        Clear the list of fields to restart layout.

      • setLayoutBy

        public void setLayoutBy(FormRecordPane.LayoutBy layoutBy)
        Set the type of layout of the default or unique field group. The must be only one field group.
        Parameters:
        layoutBy - The type of layout.

        Set the type of layout of a field group.
